external_references.description: Threat Hunter Team Symantec and Carbon Black. (2025, March 6). Medusa Ransomware Activity Continues to Increase. Retrieved October 15, 2025.

objects.description: [Medusa Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1051) has utilized [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029) to execute `quser` to discover the user session information.(Citation: Broadcom Medusa Ransomware Medusa Group March 2025)
